original_text:
Let It Spin
Una grafica da sogno
Se siete alla ricerca della giusta atmosfera che vi accompagni durante le feste natalizie, Leo It Spin di Bllomig Games è la slot giusta per voi.
Appena apriamo la schermata principale, ci troviamo di fronte a una baita di legno, con una poltrona rossa davanti al camino acceso, un grande albero addobbato con luminarie dai mille colori e una montagna di regali. Se dovessimo indovinare, diremmo di trovarci all’interno della casa di Babbo Natale. Tutta la grafica in generale richiama a Santa Claus, a cominciare dai simboli: le carte da gioco all’interno di palline colorate, le renne, gli orsetti di peluche, le campanelle, i fiocchi di neve e l’immancabile Babbo Natale.
Ad alimentare lo spirito natalizio c’è poi la musica di sottofondo a tema e gli immancabili Oh! Oh! Oh!
 
Caratteristiche di Let it Spin
La griglia di gioco è composta da 6 rulli e 4 righe, 30 linee di pagamenti fisse e una vincita massima di 2.500 volte la puntata a fronte di un costo minimo di 0,30 € per Spin. Per vincere è necessario creare combo di simboli identici su una linea di pagamento, partendo dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
Tra le varie opzioni troviamo i giri automatici che si arresteranno al raggiungimento di alcuni limiti di vincita e di perdita, e il Turbo, che invece accelererà la rotazione dei rulli per avere giri veloci.
La volatilità è media, mentre il dato RTP si attesta su un buon 95%.
 
Una ventata di Bonus
I simboli che atterreranno sulle bobine possono essere suddivisi in alcuni di basso valore e altri molto più remunerativi. Appartenenti al primo gruppo sono le carte da gioco, mentre la campana dorata, la renna, l’orsacchiotto e Santa Claus possono essere definiti simboli premium.
Tra i simboli speciali troviamo Wild e Scatter. Il primo ha funzione di Jolly e va a sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter in una combo pagante. Lo Scatter è invece rappresentato dal fiocco di neve e in base al numero atterrato sulle bobine, ci ricompensa con un numero di Free Spins compreso tra 8 e 20. Ricordiamo che il Bonus Game può essere acquistato al costo di 70x la puntata.
Ci sono poi due funzioni speciali casuali introdotte dal classico Oh! Oh! Oh! di Babbo Natale. Nella prima, una ventata gelida che entra dalla finestra dietro la griglia farà depositare sino a un massimo di 20 Wild.
La funzione denominata Bursting Wild invece farà in modo che i Jolly sulla griglia si replichino sino a coprire l’intera bobina.
 

Domande Frequenti 
Posso giocare a Let it Spin anche sullo smartphone?

Sì, questo gioco è fruibile sia da pc che da qualsiasi dispositivo mobile.



È possibile acquistare i Free Spins?

Sì, si possono comprare al costo di 70 volte la puntata.



Che tipo di volatilità ha Let it Spin?

La volatilità è media.

raw_translation.response:
Let It Spin
A Dreamlike Graphics
Looking for the right atmosphere to accompany you during the Christmas holidays? Let It Spin by Bllomig Games is the perfect slot for you. As soon as you open the main screen, you are faced with a wooden cabin, with a red armchair in front of the lit fireplace, a large tree decorated with multicolored lights and a mountain of gifts. If we had to guess, we'd say we're inside Santa's house. The graphics in general recall Santa Claus, starting with the symbols: playing cards inside colored balls, reindeer, teddy bears, bells, snowflakes, and of course, Santa Claus himself.

Engaging Features of Let It Spin
The game grid consists of 6 reels and 4 rows, 30 fixed pay lines, and a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet for a minimum cost of €0.30 per spin. To win, you need to create combos of identical symbols on a pay line, starting from the left reel and moving to the right.

One of the various options available is automatic spins that stop when certain limits of winnings or losses are reached, and Turbo, which accelerates reel rotation for faster spins. The volatility is medium, while the RTP value stands at a good 95%.

A Glimpse of Bonus Features
The symbols that land on the reels can be divided into some of low value and others that are more rewarding. The playing cards belong to the first group, while the golden bell, reindeer, teddy bears, and Santa Claus are considered premium symbols.

Special symbols include Wild and Scatter. The former has the function of a wild card and replaces all symbols except the Scatter in a paying combo. The Scatter is represented by a snowflake, and the number that lands on the reels rewards us with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 20. Remember that the Bonus Game can be purchased at a cost of 70x the bet.

There are also two randomly activated special functions introduced by Santa Claus's classic "Oh! Oh! Oh!" In the first, a cold gust that enters through the window behind the grid will deposit up to a maximum of 20 Wild symbols.

The Bursting Wild feature ensures that the Wild symbols on the grid replicate themselves to cover the entire reel.

Frequently Asked Questions
Can I play Let It Spin on my smartphone?

Yes, this game is suitable for both PC and any mobile device.

Is it possible to buy Free Spins?

Yes, you can purchase them at a cost of 70 times the bet.

What kind of volatility does Let It Spin have?

The volatility is medium.

A Dreamlike Graphics
Looking for the right atmosphere to accompany you during the Christmas holidays? Let It Spin by Bllomig Games is the perfect slot for you. As soon as you open the main screen, you are faced with a wooden cabin, with a red armchair in front of the lit fireplace, a large tree decorated with multicolored lights and a mountain of gifts. If we had to guess, we'd say we're inside Santa's house. The graphics in general recall Santa Claus, starting with the symbols: playing cards inside colored balls, reindeer, teddy bears, bells, snowflakes, and of course, Santa Claus himself.

Engaging Features of Let It Spin
The game grid consists of 6 reels and 4 rows, 30 fixed pay lines, and a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet for a minimum cost of €0.30 per spin. To win, you need to create combos of identical symbols on a pay line, starting from the left reel and moving to the right.

One of the various options available is automatic spins that stop when certain limits of winnings or losses are reached, and Turbo, which accelerates reel rotation for faster spins. The volatility is medium, while the RTP value stands at a good 95%.

Special symbols include Wild and Scatter. The former has the function of a wild card and replaces all symbols except the Scatter in a paying combo. The Scatter is represented by a snowflake, and the number that lands on the reels rewards us with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 20. Remember that the Bonus Game can be purchased at a cost of 70x the bet.

There are also two randomly activated special functions introduced by Santa Claus's classic "Oh! Oh! Oh!" In the first, a cold gust that enters through the window behind the grid will deposit up to a maximum of 20 Wild symbols.

The Bursting Wild feature ensures that the Wild symbols on the grid replicate themselves to cover the entire reel.

Let It Spin
A Dreamlike Graphics
If you're looking for the right atmosphere to accompany you during the Christmas holidays, Leo It Spin by Bllomig Games is the right slot for you.
As soon as we open the main screen, we find ourselves facing a wooden cabin, with a red armchair in front of the lit fireplace, a large tree decorated with colorful lights and a mountain of gifts. If we had to guess, we would say we are inside Santa Claus' house. All the graphics recall Santa Claus, starting from the symbols: the playing cards inside colorful balls, the reindeer, teddy bears, bells, snowflakes and the inevitable Santa Claus.
To fuel the holiday spirit, there is also themed background music and the inevitable Oh! Oh! Oh!

Features of Let it Spin
The game grid consists of 6 reels and 4 rows, 30 fixed pay lines and a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet for a minimum cost of € 0.30 per spin. To win, you need to create combos of identical symbols on a pay line, starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right.
Among the various options, we find the automatic spins that will stop when certain winning and losing limits are reached, and the Turbo, which instead accelerates the rotation of the reels for fast spins.
The volatility is medium, while the RTP data stands at a good 95%.

A Burst of Bonus
The symbols that land on the reels can be divided into some of low value and others much more remunerative. Belonging to the first group are the playing cards, while the golden bell, reindeer, teddy bear and Santa Claus can be defined as premium symbols.
Among the special symbols we find Wild and Scatter. The first has a Jolly function and replaces all symbols except the Scatter in a winning combo. The Scatter is instead represented by the snowflake and depending on the number landed on the reels, rewards us with a number of Free Spins ranging from 8 to 20. We remind you that the Bonus Game can be purchased at a cost of 70x the bet.
Then there are two special random functions introduced by the classic Oh! Oh! Oh! of Santa Claus. In the first one, a cold breeze that enters from the window behind the grid will deposit up to a maximum of 20 Wilds.
The function called Bursting Wild instead ensures that the Jolly on the grid are replicated until they cover the entire reel.

FAQ

Yes, this game is available on both PCs and any mobile device.

Yes, they can be purchased at a cost of 70 times the bet.

Let It Spin
A Dreamlike Graphics
If you're looking for the right atmosphere to accompany you during the Christmas holidays, Leo It Spin by Bllomig Games is the right slot for you.
As soon as we open the main screen, we find ourselves facing a wooden cabin, with a red armchair in front of the lit fireplace, a large tree decorated with colorful lights and a mountain of gifts. If we had to guess, we would say we are inside Santa Claus' house. All the graphics recall Santa Claus, starting from the symbols: the playing cards inside colorful balls, the reindeer, teddy bears, bells, snowflakes and the inevitable Santa Claus.
To fuel the holiday spirit, there is also themed background music and the inevitable Oh! Oh! Oh!

Features of Let it Spin
The game grid consists of 6 reels and 4 rows, 30 fixed pay lines and a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet for a minimum cost of € 0.30 per spin. To win, you need to create combos of identical symbols on a pay line, starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right.
Among the various options, we find the automatic spins that will stop when certain winning and losing limits are reached, and the Turbo, which instead accelerates the rotation of the reels for fast spins.
The volatility is medium, while the RTP data stands at a good 95%.

A Burst of Bonus
The symbols that land on the reels can be divided into some of low value and others much more remunerative. Belonging to the first group are the playing cards, while the golden bell, reindeer, teddy bear and Santa Claus can be defined as premium symbols.
Among the special symbols we find Wild and Scatter. The first has a Jolly function and replaces all symbols except the Scatter in a winning combo. The Scatter is instead represented by the snowflake and depending on the number landed on the reels, rewards us with a number of Free Spins ranging from 8 to 20. We remind you that the Bonus Game can be purchased at a cost of 70x the bet.
Then there are two special random functions introduced by the classic Oh! Oh! Oh! of Santa Claus. In the first one, a cold breeze that enters from the window behind the grid will deposit up to a maximum of 20 Wilds.
The function called Bursting Wild instead ensures that the Jolly on the grid are replicated until they cover the entire reel.

Yes, this game is available on both PCs and any mobile device.

response.headline: Let It Spin slot game overview
response.content: Let It Spin by Bloomig Games is a Christmas-themed online slot game that features dreamlike graphics to create the perfect holiday atmosphere. The game has a wooden cabin as the main screen, with a red armchair in front of a lit fireplace, a large tree decorated with colorful lights, and a mountain of gifts. The symbols also revolve around the Christmas theme, featuring characters like Santa Claus, reindeer, teddy bears, snowflakes, and bells. The game has a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet, and the minimum cost of a spin is €0.30.

response.headline: Gameplay and symbols
response.content: The Let It Spin game grid has 6 reels and 4 rows, with 30 fixed paylines. To win, players need to create combos of the same symbols on a payline starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right. The game has an automatic spins feature that stops when winning and losing limits are reached, and a Turbo feature that accelerates the rotation of the reels for fast spins. The game has medium volatility, and the RTP stands at 95%. The game symbols are of low value and much more remunerative, featuring golden bells, reindeer, teddy bears, and Santa Claus as premium symbols.

response.headline: Special features and bonuses
response.content: Let It Spin has two special symbols, the Wild and Scatter. The Wild symbol replaces all symbols except the Scatter in a winning combo. The Scatter is represented by the snowflake and rewards players with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 20, depending on the number of Scatters landed on the reels. The game also has two random functions called the Cold Breeze and Bursting Wild. In the first one, a cold breeze that enters from the window behind the grid will deposit up to a maximum of 20 Wilds. The Bursting Wild function ensures that the Wilds on the grid are replicated until they cover the entire reel. Players can also purchase the Bonus Game at a cost of 70 times the bet.

response.headline: Technical specifications and compatibility
response.content: Let It Spin is available on both PCs and mobile devices. The minimum cost of a spin is €0.30, and the game has a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet. The game has medium volatility, while the RTP stands at 95%.

response.headline: Overall gaming experience
response.content: Let It Spin by Bloomig Games is a great online slot game for players looking for a Christmas-themed slot game with dreamlike graphics and a perfect holiday atmosphere. The game grid has 6 reels and 4 rows, 30 fixed paylines, and the maximum win is 2,500 times the bet. The game has Wild and Scatter symbols and special functions like Cold Breeze and Bursting Wild. The game is available on both PCs and mobile devices with medium volatility and an RTP of 95%. Overall, Let It Spin delivers an enjoyable gaming experience for players.

To fuel the holiday spirit, there is also themed background music and the inevitable Oh! Oh! Oh!

Features of Let it Spin
The game grid consists of 6 reels and 4 rows, 30 fixed pay lines and a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet for a minimum cost of € 0.30 per spin. To win, you need to create combos of identical symbols on a pay line, starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right.
Among the various options, we find the automatic spins that will stop when certain winning and losing limits are reached, and the Turbo, which instead accelerates the rotation of the reels for fast spins.
The volatility is medium, while the RTP data stands at a good 95%.

A Burst of Bonus
The symbols that land on the reels can be divided into some of low value and others much more remunerative. Belonging to the first group are the playing cards, while the golden bell, reindeer, teddy bear and Santa Claus can be defined as premium symbols.
Among the special symbols we find Wild and Scatter. The first has a Jolly function and replaces all symbols except the Scatter in a winning combo. The Scatter is instead represented by the snowflake and depending on the number landed on the reels, rewards us with a number of Free Spins ranging from 8 to 20. We remind you that the Bonus Game can be purchased at a cost of 70x the bet.
Then there are two special random functions introduced by the classic Oh! Oh! Oh! of Santa Claus. In the first one, a cold breeze that enters from the window behind the grid will deposit up to a maximum of 20 Wilds.
The function called Bursting Wild instead ensures that the Jolly on the grid are replicated until they cover the entire reel.

FAQ
Can I play Let it Spin on my smartphone?

Yes, this game is available on both PCs and any mobile device.

Is it possible to buy Free Spins?

Yes, they can be purchased at a cost of 70 times the bet.

What type of volatility does Let it Spin have?

The volatility is medium.

response.headline: Unleash the Excitement with Special Features and Bonuses
response.content:
If you thought Let It Spin was all about playing cards and betting for cash, think again!
This game comes loaded with Wild and Scatter symbols. And no, we're not talking about your crazy aunt's weekend party.
The Wild replaces all other symbols (except the Scatter) to help you get a winning combo. But wait, it gets better. The Scatter is represented by a snowflake, and gives players free spins ranging from 8 to 20, depending on how many Scatters you land. It's like being in a winter wonderland where you don't have to worry about frostbite or avenging your father's death.
But the excitement doesn't stop there. Let It Spin has two random functions; the Cold Breeze and Bursting Wild. The Cold Breeze function is like being hit by a snowball out of nowhere, except instead of a snowball, you get up to 20 Wilds deposited randomly on the grid. The Bursting Wild function multiplies Wilds on the grid until they cover the entire reel! Yes, we know it sounds too good to be true, but trust us, it's real!
And for the cherry on top, players have the option to purchase the Bonus Game at seventy times the bet cost, because who doesn't love a little extra, right? If you're looking for a slot game with more surprises than a clown car, Let It Spin is your game!

It's like a slot version of a soda vending machine - the more you match, the bigger the prize! Review:
 
Let It Spin slot game overview

Let It Spin by Bloomig Games is a Christmas-themed online slot game that features dreamlike graphics to create the perfect holiday atmosphere. The game has a wooden cabin as the main screen, with a red armchair in front of a lit fireplace, a large tree decorated with colorful lights, and a mountain of gifts. The symbols also revolve around the Christmas theme, featuring characters like Santa Claus, reindeer, teddy bears, snowflakes, and bells. The game has a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet, and the minimum cost of a spin is €0.30.

Gameplay and symbols

The Let It Spin game grid has 6 reels and 4 rows, with 30 fixed paylines. To win, players need to create combos of the same symbols on a payline starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right. The game has an automatic spins feature that stops when winning and losing limits are reached, and a Turbo feature that accelerates the rotation of the reels for fast spins. The game has medium volatility, and the RTP stands at 95%. The game symbols are of low value and much more remunerative, featuring golden bells, reindeer, teddy bears, and Santa Claus as premium symbols. 

Special features and bonuses

Let It Spin has two special symbols, the Wild and Scatter. The Wild symbol replaces all symbols except the Scatter in a winning combo. The Scatter is represented by the snowflake and rewards players with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 20, depending on the number of Scatters landed on the reels. The game also has two random functions called the Cold Breeze and Bursting Wild. In the first one, a cold breeze that enters from the window behind the grid will deposit up to a maximum of 20 Wilds. The Bursting Wild function ensures that the Wilds on the grid are replicated until they cover the entire reel. Players can also purchase the Bonus Game at a cost of 70 times the bet.

Technical specifications and compatibility

Let It Spin is available on both PCs and mobile devices. The minimum cost of a spin is €0.30, and the game has a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet. The game has medium volatility, while the RTP stands at 95%.

Overall gaming experience

Let It Spin by Bloomig Games is a great online slot game for players looking for a Christmas-themed slot game with dreamlike graphics and a perfect holiday atmosphere. The game grid has 6 reels and 4 rows, 30 fixed paylines, and the maximum win is 2,500 times the bet. The game has Wild and Scatter symbols and special functions like Cold Breeze and Bursting Wild. The game is available on both PCs and mobile devices with medium volatility and an RTP of 95%. Overall, Let It Spin delivers an enjoyable gaming experience for players.

Review:
 
Let It Spin Slot Game

Let it Spin is an online slot game by Blooming Games that features 6 reels, 4 rows, 30 fixed paylines and a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet. The game has a Christmassy theme that recreates the atmosphere of Santa Claus with a wooden cabin, decorated tree with colorful lights, piles of gifts and themed background music.

Gameplay Details

To win, players need to create combos of identical symbols on a payline, starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right. The minimum cost for each spin is €0.30, and the game has medium volatility. Features include automatic spins that will stop when winning and losing limits are reached, and a Turbo button that accelerates the rotation of the reels for faster spins. The RTP is 95%.

Symbols on the Reels

Symbols on the reels in Let it Spin can be split into lower and higher paying values. The lower value symbols are the playing cards inside colorful balls, while higher value symbols include the golden bells, reindeer, teddy bears and Santa Claus. The Wild symbol has a Jolly function and replaces all symbols except the Scatter to create a winning combo. The Scatter is represented by the snowflake and awards up to 20 free spins depending on the number of Scatters landed. Players can also buy free spins at a cost of 70x the bet.

Special Features and Bonuses

Let it Spin has two unique random functions triggered by the classic Oh! Oh! Oh! of Santa Claus. The first function named Cold Breeze deposits up to 20 Wilds when a cold breeze enters from the window behind the grid. The second function, Bursting Wild, replicates the Jolly on the grid until they cover the entire reel, increasing the chances of hitting a winning combo.

Availability on Devices

Let it Spin is available on both PCs and mobile devices, allowing players to enjoy the game on-the-go or from the comfort of their own home.

faq.question: What is Let it Spin about?
faq.answer: Let it Spin is an online slot game developed by Blooming Games. It has a Christmas theme, and players can expect to see symbols related to the holiday season, including Santa Claus, reindeer, teddy bears, bells, and snowflakes.

faq.question: How many reels and paylines does Let it Spin have?
faq.answer: Let it Spin has 6 reels and 30 fixed paylines.

faq.question: What is the maximum payout in Let it Spin?
faq.answer: The maximum payout in Let it Spin is 2,500 times the bet.

faq.question: What is the minimum bet in Let it Spin?
faq.answer: The minimum bet in Let it Spin is €0.30 per spin.

faq.question: What is the RTP of Let it Spin?
faq.answer: The RTP of Let it Spin is 95%, which is a good figure.

faq.question: What are the bonus features in Let it Spin?
faq.answer: Let it Spin has several bonus features, including Wilds, Scatters, Free Spins, and two special random functions known as the Cold Breeze and Bursting Wilds, which can add up to 20 Wilds and replicate them until they cover the entire reel.

faq.question: Can you play Let it Spin on mobile devices?
faq.answer: Yes, Let it Spin is available on both PCs and any mobile device.

faq.question: Can you buy Free Spins in Let it Spin?
faq.answer: Yes, you can purchase Free Spins in Let it Spin at a cost of 70 times the bet.

Review: Let It Spin
A Dreamlike Graphics
If you're looking for the right atmosphere to accompany you during the Christmas holidays, Leo It Spin by Bllomig Games is the right slot for you.
As soon as we open the main screen, we find ourselves facing a wooden cabin, with a red armchair in front of the lit fireplace, a large tree decorated with colorful lights and a mountain of gifts. If we had to guess, we would say we are inside Santa Claus' house. All the graphics recall Santa Claus, starting from the symbols: the playing cards inside colorful balls, the reindeer, teddy bears, bells, snowflakes and the inevitable Santa Claus.
To fuel the holiday spirit, there is also themed background music and the inevitable Oh! Oh! Oh!

Features of Let it Spin
The game grid consists of 6 reels and 4 rows, 30 fixed pay lines and a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet for a minimum cost of € 0.30 per spin. To win, you need to create combos of identical symbols on a pay line, starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right.
Among the various options, we find the automatic spins that will stop when certain winning and losing limits are reached, and the Turbo, which instead accelerates the rotation of the reels for fast spins.
The volatility is medium, while the RTP data stands at a good 95%.

A Burst of Bonus
The symbols that land on the reels can be divided into some of low value and others much more remunerative. Belonging to the first group are the playing cards, while the golden bell, reindeer, teddy bear and Santa Claus can be defined as premium symbols.
Among the special symbols we find Wild and Scatter. The first has a Jolly function and replaces all symbols except the Scatter in a winning combo. The Scatter is instead represented by the snowflake and depending on the number landed on the reels, rewards us with a number of Free Spins ranging from 8 to 20. We remind you that the Bonus Game can be purchased at a cost of 70x the bet.
Then there are two special random functions introduced by the classic Oh! Oh! Oh! of Santa Claus. In the first one, a cold breeze that enters from the window behind the grid will deposit up to a maximum of 20 Wilds.
The function called Bursting Wild instead ensures that the Jolly on the grid are replicated until they cover the entire reel.

FAQ
Can I play Let it Spin on my smartphone?

Yes, this game is available on both PCs and any mobile device.

Is it possible to buy Free Spins?

Yes, they can be purchased at a cost of 70 times the bet.

What type of volatility does Let it Spin have?

The volatility is medium.
